medicine.name: Dettol Antiseptic Liquid
medicine.precuations: Use only on external areas. Avoid direct contact with eyes or mouth. Keep tightly closed and store away from sunlight and flames. Always dilute before applying to the skin.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause slight burning or irritation if used undiluted. Rarely, redness or dryness may occur in sensitive skin.

medicine.name: Himalaya Face Wash
medicine.precuations: Avoid contact with eyes. Use twice daily for best results. Store in a cool, dry place and keep away from children.
medicine.sideEffects: Mild dryness or tightening sensation may occur in some users. Discontinue if irritation persists.

medicine.name: Vaseline Petroleum Jelly
medicine.precuations: For external use only. Avoid applying inside the nose or near eyes. Keep container clean and closed after each use.
medicine.sideEffects: Generally safe, though rarely may clog pores in oily skin or cause minor breakouts.

medicine.name: Dove Body Lotion
medicine.precuations: Apply evenly on clean, dry skin. Avoid use on open cuts or wounds. Keep away from extreme heat.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause mild irritation if applied to broken skin or in people with fragrance allergies.

medicine.name: Listerine Mouthwash
medicine.precuations: Do not swallow. Use only the directed amount. Keep away from children and avoid use under 12 years of age without medical advice.
medicine.sideEffects: A brief burning sensation may occur. Overuse can cause dryness or altered taste.

medicine.name: Vitamin C Tablets
medicine.precuations: Take after meals with water. Do not exceed the recommended dose. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause mild stomach upset or acidity if taken on an empty stomach.

medicine.name: Zincovit Multivitamin
medicine.precuations: Take one tablet daily after food. Keep away from moisture and out of reach of children.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause nausea if taken on an empty stomach. Rarely, mild headache or constipation.

medicine.name: Protinex Powder
medicine.precuations: Mix well in milk or water before use. Not suitable for people with kidney disorders unless prescribed. Store airtight.
medicine.sideEffects: Excessive intake may cause bloating or digestive discomfort.

medicine.name: Revital H Capsules
medicine.precuations: Consume one capsule daily after breakfast. Do not exceed dosage. Keep sealed tightly.
medicine.sideEffects: Generally safe, though may cause mild indigestion if taken on an empty stomach.

medicine.name: Ensure Nutritional Drink
medicine.precuations: Shake well before use. Keep container closed. Do not freeze or heat directly. Use within 3 weeks after opening.
medicine.sideEffects: Rarely causes mild bloating or gas in sensitive stomachs.

medicine.name: Dabur Chyawanprash
medicine.precuations: Consume one spoon twice daily with milk or water. Store in a cool, dry place. Not recommended for diabetics without advice.
medicine.sideEffects: Excess use may lead to acidity or weight gain due to sugar content.

medicine.name: Patanjali Aloe Vera Juice
medicine.precuations: Shake before use. Consume on an empty stomach. Avoid during pregnancy unless advised by doctor.
medicine.sideEffects: Overuse may cause diarrhea or abdominal cramps.

medicine.name: Himalaya Ashwagandha Tablets
medicine.precuations: Take one tablet daily with water. Avoid use during pregnancy. Store away from moisture.
medicine.sideEffects: Mild sleepiness or stomach upset may occur in some users.

medicine.name: Kerala Ayurveda Triphala
medicine.precuations: Take before bedtime with warm water. Do not exceed recommended dose. Keep sealed tightly.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause loose stools if consumed in excess.

medicine.name: Baidyanath Shilajit
medicine.precuations: Take only as per recommended dose. Avoid if you have gout or kidney problems.
medicine.sideEffects: Overuse may lead to mild dizziness or heat sensation.

medicine.name: Johnson’s Baby Oil
medicine.precuations: Use externally only. Avoid contact with baby’s eyes or mouth. Keep bottle tightly closed.
medicine.sideEffects: Rarely may cause minor rash if baby has sensitive skin.

medicine.name: Pampers Diapers
medicine.precuations: Change diapers frequently to prevent rashes. Dispose responsibly. Keep in a clean, dry place.
medicine.sideEffects: Prolonged use may cause rashes or redness on skin.

medicine.name: Nestle Lactogen 1
medicine.precuations: Prepare with clean, boiled water. Use freshly made formula each time. Do not store prepared feed.
medicine.sideEffects: Overfeeding may cause constipation or spit-up.

medicine.name: Himalaya Baby Soap
medicine.precuations: Use gentle water to lather. Avoid eye contact. Store away from direct heat.
medicine.sideEffects: Very rare mild irritation in extremely sensitive skin.

medicine.name: Sebamed Baby Lotion
medicine.precuations: Apply on clean, dry skin after bath. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep tightly closed.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause mild redness in some infants if allergic to ingredients.

medicine.name: Refresh Tears Eye Drops
medicine.precuations: Do not touch the dropper tip. Use within one month of opening. Avoid sharing with others.
medicine.sideEffects: Temporary blurred vision or mild stinging may occur.

medicine.name: Itone Eye Drops
medicine.precuations: Wash hands before use. Do not use expired drops. Store away from sunlight.
medicine.sideEffects: Mild stinging for a few seconds after application.

medicine.name: Bausch & Lomb Renu Solution
medicine.precuations: Use only for cleaning lenses. Do not touch bottle tip. Replace solution every 30 days.
medicine.sideEffects: Eye irritation or dryness if solution is reused or contaminated.

medicine.name: Tears Naturale Eye Drops
medicine.precuations: Do not wear contact lenses immediately after use. Keep bottle tightly closed.
medicine.sideEffects: Mild irritation or watery eyes for a short time.

medicine.name: Optrex Eye Wash
medicine.precuations: Always use clean eyewash cup. Discard used liquid after one wash.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause a brief tingling sensation when used.

medicine.name: Benadryl Cough Syrup
medicine.precuations: Shake well before use. Avoid driving or operating machinery. Do not mix with alcohol.
medicine.sideEffects: Can cause drowsiness, dry mouth, or dizziness.

medicine.name: Vicks Vaporub
medicine.precuations: Apply externally only. Do not use on open wounds or near nostrils of infants.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause a burning feeling if used on sensitive skin.

medicine.name: Cofsils Lozenges
medicine.precuations: Allow lozenge to dissolve slowly. Do not chew. Store in a dry place.
medicine.sideEffects: Excess use may cause numbness in mouth or mild stomach upset.

medicine.name: Sinarest Tablets
medicine.precuations: Take after food with water. Avoid alcohol or driving after taking. Keep away from children.
medicine.sideEffects: Drowsiness, dry mouth, or mild dizziness may occur.

medicine.name: Honitus Herbal Cough Syrup
medicine.precuations: Shake bottle well before use. Use the measuring cap for accurate dosage. Store below 30°C.
medicine.sideEffects: Generally safe, may cause mild stomach upset in rare cases.

medicine.name: Omron BP Monitor
medicine.precuations: Read the manual carefully before first use. Sit calmly for a few minutes before measuring.
medicine.sideEffects: No direct side effects; incorrect usage may give inaccurate readings.

medicine.name: Dr. Morepen Glucometer
medicine.precuations: Clean device regularly. Use only compatible strips. Do not reuse lancets.
medicine.sideEffects: Slight finger prick pain may occur while testing.

medicine.name: Accu-Chek Test Strips
medicine.precuations: Store in a cool, dry place. Close the vial immediately after removing a strip.
medicine.sideEffects: No known side effects.

medicine.name: Digital Thermometer
medicine.precuations: Clean tip before and after each use. Do not immerse entire device in water.
medicine.sideEffects: None, unless used incorrectly causing inaccurate results.

medicine.name: Pulse Oximeter
medicine.precuations: Ensure fingers are clean and warm. Avoid bright light during reading.
medicine.sideEffects: Temporary finger marks if used for long periods.

medicine.name: Adult Diapers
medicine.precuations: Change frequently to prevent rashes. Dispose properly. Do not flush.
medicine.sideEffects: Prolonged use may cause mild rash or irritation.

medicine.name: Walker with Wheels
medicine.precuations: Adjust height properly before use. Use on flat surfaces. Check grips regularly.
medicine.sideEffects: No side effects if used correctly.

medicine.name: Heating Pad
medicine.precuations: Do not use continuously for long periods. Avoid using while sleeping.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause mild redness if used too long or at high temperature.

medicine.name: Wheelchair Foldable
medicine.precuations: Lock brakes before getting in or out. Regularly inspect for loose screws.
medicine.sideEffects: None when used properly.

medicine.name: Hot Water Bag
medicine.precuations: Do not fill with boiling water. Check for leaks before use.
medicine.sideEffects: May cause burns if used on bare skin or with very hot water.

bookings.deliveryAddress: House No. 12, Green Street, Kochi, Kerala
